list.abs: 英语家园论坛 -... ... married happiness 婚后的幸福生活 a shortlived happiness 短暂的幸福 one's lost happiness 失去的幸福.
电动自行车 - 豆丁网 ... in policy： 朝令夕改 be born today and die tomorrow；be shortlived 朝生暮死.

entry.def: Something that is short-lived does not last very long.

example.ex: Any hope that the speech would end the war was short-lived...
example.tran: 期待这场演讲能结束战争的希望很快便破灭了。

example.ex: Chantal told Martine about her short-lived marriage.
example.tran: 尚塔尔跟马丁内谈起她短暂的婚姻。

auth_sentence.content: But some believe the good news may be shortlived.
auth_sentence.res_content: But some believe the good news may be shortlived.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But some believe the good news may be shortlived.

auth_sentence.content: Turkey's rage with Syria will be swift and shortlived.
auth_sentence.res_content: Turkey's rage with Syria will be swift and shortlived.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Turkey's rage with Syria will be swift and shortlived.

auth_sentence.content: Its success was meteoric but shortlived.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its success was meteoric but shortlived.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
baesInfo.translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
